sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两外名词均有"申请，请求"之意。
means: application ：指用书面形式提出申请或请求。
request ：普通用词，侧重指明有礼貌或诚意的请求，能否得到满足并无多大把握。

word_mean: 一种技术、系统或产品的使用。

sentence.Network_en: After a year we will sympathetically consider an application for reinstatement.
sentence.Network_cn: 一年后我们会对复职申请予以考虑和批准。

sentence.Network_en: De Gaulle vetoed Britain's application to join the EEC.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴高乐驳回了英国加入欧洲经济共同体的申请。

sentence.Network_en: How do the two techniques compare in terms of application?
sentence.Network_cn: 这两种手法实际运用起来哪个好一些？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 应用程序简称为应用（Application），它包含了整个应用程序的所有内容。任何应用程序都应有一个入口点。
...ker的客户提供给本地化公司的排版人员，需要把这个应用程序(Application)复制到Adobe Framemaker安装后的“Structure”文件夹下。
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... applicant n. 申请人 application n. 申请 apply v. 申请.
UL 1571-WIRE规格 ... ●特性◆ Features ●用途◆ Application ●构造◆ Construction.

list.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... appetite 食欲, 胃口 applicant 申请人 appropriate 适当的.
1. 开证申请人（Applicant）：向开证银行申请开立信用证的人，一般是进口人。在信用证中又称开证人（Opener）。
加加明_百度百科 ... 三、遵医嘱慎用 Doctor caution 一、适用范围（applicability） Applicability 二、禁忌症 Contraindication.
普特英语听力_百度文库 ... available a. 现成可用的;可得到的 applicable a. 可应用的，适当的 applicant n. 申请人.
普特英语听力_百度文库 ... available a. 现成可用的;可得到的 applicable a. 可应用的，适当的 applicant n. 申请人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : via Old French from Latin applicatio(n-), from the verb applicare (see apply)

entry.tran: 申请；请求；申请书；申请表
entry.def: An application for something such as a job or membership of an organization is a formal written request for it.

example.ex: His application for membership of the organisation was rejected...
example.tran: 他想要加入该组织的申请遭到了拒绝。

example.ex: ...Turkey's application to join the European Community...
example.tran: 土耳其要求加入欧共体的申请

entry.def: The application of a rule or piece of knowledge is the use of it in a particular situation.

example.ex: Students learned the practical application of the theory they had learned in the classroom...
example.tran: 学生们学会了将课堂上学到的理论付诸实际应用。

example.ex: Simon's book provides a succinct outline of artificial intelligence and its application to robotics.
example.tran: 西蒙的书简明扼要地概括了人工智能及其在机器人技术方面的应用。

entry.def: In computing, an application is a piece of software designed to carry out a particular task.
Application is hard work and concentration on what you are doing over a period of time.

example.ex: ...his immense talent, boundless energy and unremitting application.
example.tran: 他横溢的才华、充沛的精力和不懈的努力

entry.def: The application of something to a surface is the act or process of putting it on or rubbing it into the surface.

example.ex: With repeated applications of weedkiller, the weeds were overcome.
example.tran: 经过反复施用除草剂，杂草得以彻底根除。

means.word_mean: 1. a verbal or written request for assistance or employment or admission to a school;
2. the act of bringing something to bear; using it for a particular purpose;

sentences.sentence: "he advocated the application of statistics to the problem"
"a novel application of electronics to medical diagnosis"

means.word_mean: 3. a program that gives a computer instructions that provide the user with tools to accomplish a task;

sentences.sentence: "he has tried several different word processing applications"
"the doctor prescribed a topical application of iodine"
"the surface was ready for a coating of paint";

means.word_mean: 5. liquid preparation having a soothing or antiseptic or medicinal action when applied to the skin;

sentences.sentence: "it is a job requiring serious application"

auth_sentence.content: Should have application well beyond the world of sport.
auth_sentence.res_content: Should have application well beyond the world of sport.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Should have application well beyond the world of sport.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, of course, application makes a difference.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, of course, application makes a difference.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, of course, application makes a difference.

auth_sentence.content: Many also fear the strict application of Sharia law.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many also fear the strict application of Sharia law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many also fear the strict application of Sharia law.

Sentence.sentence: Nothing, it's just that she submitted a job application yesterday and the company asked her in for an interview today.
Hand in her roommate's application form
But a new application called Inkling might change all that.

means.word_mean: 申请, 请求, 申请表, 申请书
实际应用, 用途, （尤指理论、发现等的）应用, 运用

sentences.en: This is a new discovery that had a number of industrial applications.
sentences.cn: 这是一项有多种工业用途的新发明。

means.word_mean: 施用, 敷用, 涂抹

sentences.en: Your foot will feel better after the application of this ointment.
sentences.cn: 敷用这药膏后, 你的脚会感到舒服些。

jushi.english: Your foot will feel better after the application of this ointment.
jushi.chinese: 敷用这药膏后,你的脚会感到舒服些。

jushi.english: The oil is for external application only.
The application of new scientific discoveries to industrial processes usually makes jobs easier to do.
jushi.chinese: 应用新的科学发明于工业生产过程常可使工作更轻松。
